title: Agent Skill YAML Frontmatter
description: Validation schema for YAML frontmatter in SKILL.md files per official Claude Code skills structure

name.description: Skill name in kebab-case. Max 64 characters. Lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens only. Cannot start/end with hyphen.

description.description: Brief description of what this skill does and when to use it. Max 1024 characters.
